description.english: Entered the Forest Memory for the first time!
Accepted a Cursed Shrine's gift 25 times. Are you sure this is a good idea?
You were cursed by ??? 10 times. Maybe you should flee...
You purchased 150 items from the Gambler. Have you won yet?
You purchased 25 items from the Gambler. Where does she get these, anyways?
You gambled and won a Unique item!
Found a Tier 0 Unique. Lucky you!
You found your first Anomalous NPC. Is it really safe to modify these memories like this?
You've accepted a Cursed Shrine's gift. Good luck...
??? has cursed you. I thought she was here to help...
You reached Depth 300 in the Endless Nightmare
You've leveled up 100 times! Feeling powerful yet?
You hit level 99! This is only the beginning...
Worked with the Echo Forger to refine a Memory Crystal 10 times
You met the Echo Forger 10 times
You met the Crafter. Things are about to get complicated...
You've crafted 500 items! You must be getting good at this!
You found a Memory Crystal! These items are starting to get ridiculous, aren't they?
Met the Explorer! Bet you didn't expect another skill tree!
Met 75 NPCs on your adventures. Who is your favorite?
Met 200 NPCs on your adventures. Having fun?
Reset the Chaos value on an item
You've played for at least 600 minutes! Thanks for spending so much time in Don't Die, Collect Loot!
You've played for at least 90 minutes!
You've played for at least 30 minutes
You've found 200 items! It's in the name!
You've found 5000 items! That's a lot...I think?
You spent 10 Nightmare Essences while crafting
You added a modifier to a unique item! You weren't supposed to be able to do that...
Found 50 items with 2 or more modifiers
Found 150 items with 4 ore more modifiers
You added 25 modifiers to Unique items. Stop breaking my game!
You survived 1 Astral Incursion. These memories are growing unstable...
You found 500 items with 2 or more modifiers
You found your first unique item!
You slew the Will of the Forest. What was this monstrosity doing here?
Entered the Aqueduct for the first time
Earn a total of 1,000,000 Gold. Can I have some?
Entered the Endless Nightmare for the first time. True Don't Die, Collect Loot begins here...
Entered an Anomalous Memory for the first time
Reached Depth 500 in the Endless Nightmare. You are a super player!
